description.p: Your Twi'lek character has many different attributes that might be useful in the field:
Ability Score Increase. Charisma +2, Dexterity +1.
Age. Up to 80 years.
Alignment. Good.
Size. Medium
Speed. 40ft.
Colorful Skin. Twi'leks were known for having colored skin. The common colors were green, blue, cream, and purple skin, but some rarer Twi'leks had red skin.
In addition, some Twi'leks had birthmarks that look like geometric tattoos.
Black Market Buyers. You have knowledge of most Black Market locations around the Outer Rim.

Seductive. You have advantage on Charisma checks made to seduce any creature that can understand you. This could be persuasion, deception, intimidation, or performance depending on how the action is performed.
Proficiency. Deception, Performance, Persuasion.
Languages. Basic, Ryl.
